response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and significance, worth $1,200,000 to you. We understand its importance and are eager to facilitate this acquisition for you.

To make this transaction possible, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving for you, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a highly favorable rate.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We are committed to ensuring a smooth and satisfactory process for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
